source_sentence: The Company is targeting the Murray and Otway Basins hosted Loxton/Parilla Sands and Padthaway Formation for REE mineralisation where Australian Rare Earths, exploring to the south of the Company's tenements has reported significant exploration success with estimated JORC 2012 resource of 236Mt @ 748 ppm Total Rare Earth Oxides (TREO) (AR3 ASX Release on 30th September 2024).
resource_context: Australian Rare Earths - JORC 2012 estimated resource
